A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was good\, not great\, and not horrible.  Compared to the rest of the Star Wars Movies\, I would put it in 6th place out of the 9 movies (I'm including Rogue One) just above the prequels.  The movie has a lot of action and is visually fun to watch. However\, the attempts at one liners and slapstick humor kind of ruined a lot of the movie for me.  The last few movies I saw several times in the theatre.  I'll wait for it to come out on Amazon video before I watch this one again.
